name: GRSFramework
tagline: Granular Rigid Body Simulation Framework: efficient research tools to simulate non-smooth granular rigid body dynamics.
body: # GRSFramework **Granular Rigid Body Simulation Framework**: efficient research tools to simulate **non-smooth** granular rigid body dynamics. ![C++](https://img.shields.io/badge/c%2B%2B-11/14-green.svg) ![Deps](https://img.shields.io/badge/dependencies-Ogre|boost| Assimp|MPI|HDF5|eigen3|pugixml|meta|ApproxMVBB|CudaFramework|python3-blue.svg) ![System](https://img.shields.io/badge/system-linux,osx,{windows}-lightgrey.svg) [Homepage](http://gabyx.github.io/GRSFramework/)
